summary: Adds a new shout. Like unrelenting force, except completely opposite. It pulls people towards you.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Adds a new shout. Unrelenting Pull. [/size]

It uses the words: FUS YAH NIR 
[size=1][u]
[/u][/size][u]How it works:[/u]

[b]FUS [/b]- Like the normal fus. Stagger.
[b]FUS YAH[/b] - Close range. Makes enemies fall over.
[b]FUS YAH NIR[/b] - Long range. Pulls enemies towards you.

[u]VIDEO DEMONSTRATION[/u][url=https://streamable.com/bw9e9]
https://streamable.com/bw9e9[/url]

I had the cooldown disabled during the video demonstration. The normal cooldown is slightly faster than unrelenting push.
____________________________________________________________________

[b]>How do I get the shout?[/b]
This shout only uses normal words that are already in the game. 
You get FUS from the main quest as usual.
Find the two others on word walls like any other shout. 
This mod doesn't replace any shouts, and it doesn't edit any of the word walls.
All vanilla shouts are untouched and this should be compatible with just about anything.


Let me know if it's too weak/strong etc. I can make adjustments.

[b]Here's a list of all words and their locations in case you're lazy[/b]
http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Dragon_Shouts
author: Surjamte
